text.autoconfig.ruined_equipment.title: Ruined Equipment Config
Enable Set Ruined Items In Hand
Enable Crafting Grid Ruined Repair
Enable Anvil Ruined Repair
Enable Smithing Ruined Empowered
Empowerment Smithing Item
Enable Ruined Mending Repair
When 'true', Ruined items will be set in-hand when they break instead of going into the inventory.
When 'true', repairing Ruined items using the Crafting Grid will be enabled.
When 'true', repairing Ruined items using the Anvil will be enabled.
When 'true', 'Empowering' a Ruined item using the Smithing Table will be enabled.
The Item to be used for applying 'Empowered' to a Ruined item in a Smithing Table.
When 'true', Ruined items with Mending held in your hands will be repaired when you collect XP.
Enable Ruined Items Ashes Generation
When 'true', non-vanilla breaking items will generate a 'Ruined Items Ashes'.
Ruined Items Ashes Repair Items
Codes for which repair items to use for which Ruined Items Ashes (e.g. 'copper_mod:copper_sword/minecraft:copper_ingot;')
Blocklist For Ruined Ashes Items
Codes for modded Items NOT to generate Ruined Items Ashes for when they break (e.g. 'copper_mod:copper_sword;')
Enable Lore Set With Name Tag
When 'true', you can apply Lore to Ruined Items in the Anvil with a Name Tag.
Skip Empty NBT Equipment Breaks
When 'true', Ruined Items will not generate if an Item breaks without any NBT data specified (besides Damage).
